TopicTitle: [HIRING!][NEW] German Aeronautics and Spaceflight Engineers Kerbin

Articles.Content:
Bringing German engineering to new heights.

You can download and review the finished (stock!) projects here.

WE ARE HIRING! APPLY FOR ANY POSITION NOW!

(Also just ask us to add your dream job if it isn't already in the list )

Thread Administrators: MarkusA380, zekes

Divisions Administrator: MarkusA380

Division Aeronautics

Teamleader: midgester222

Engineer 1: 9t3ndo (SSTO specialist)

Division Spaceflight

Teamleader: FREE

Engineer 1: FREE

Division Payloads

Teamleader: FREE

Engineer 1: FREE

Division Experimental & Testing

Teamleader: zekes

Crazy Scientist 1: FREE

New slots will be added on demand.

Every slot is just the specialisation for the team/main projects. Everyone is still allowed to upload everything, but also has a specialisation on payloads for example. That means he can still upload small stuff he has made from other classes, but he will construct payloads for team/main projects.

Warning:This thread can contain excessive German language like "Tschechisches StreichholzschÃƒÂ¤chtelchen". Read on your own risk.

Awesome will work on mission statement and ships when I get home, in the meantime WERE HIRING! APPLY HERE FOR AN ENGINEERING POSITION!
